alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hillsborough; Inland Hillsborough; Pinellas (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 4:27PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Pinellas and northern Hillsborough Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 426 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Clearwater to Brandon. Movement was south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Clearwater, Largo, Temple Terrace, Fish Hawk, Brandon, Lutz, Palm River-Clair Mel, Tampa International Airport, East Lake-Orient Park, Egypt Lake-Leto, Greater Carrollwood, Riverview, University, Keystone, Greater Northdale, East Lake, Macdill Air Force Base, Gandy, and Citrus Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
